label: 外衛府
対訳語: Headquarters of the Outer Imperial Guards
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: In charge of guarding the Greater Imperial Palace (Daidairi) and the Imperial Palace (Dairi). It was soon abolished and its guards divided among the other Headquarters of the Guards (Efu). [大内裏、内裏、衛府]
